description:
LET US COOK... a galaxy. 
Thank you for tuning in to kurzgesagt cooking classes! In today's episode we're cooking a galaxy. This simple to follow recipe includes all ingredients and easy to follow steps for you to create your own galaxy at home. 
Only one question remains unanswered: why is there a Gomu Gomu no Mi? 

#kurzgesagt #inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #cooking #cookingclass #universe #spaceshorts #spaceexploration #spacefacts #galaxyeducation 

Sources & further reading: 
https://sites.google.com/view/kgs-tiktok-sources

Follow us for more sciencey content! 🦆
